snippet: Naomi Watts and Nicole Kidman are portraying the Princess of Wales and the Princess of Monaco, respectively, in a pair of upcoming biopics. Here’s how the four ladies’ stories stack up.
abstract: Naomi Watts and Nicole Kidman are portraying the Princess of Wales and the Princess of Monaco, respectively, in a pair of upcoming biopics. Here’s how the four ladies’ stories stack up.

headline.main: The Parallel Lives of Princess Di, Princess Grace and the B.F.F. Actresses Playing Them in the Movies
